name: Signals in the Deep
description:
Creation for Game Jam 201 - Bad Connection

Play as a Small Submarine in  the sea trying to find Treasure. The Submarine is controlled remotely and Signal can be very degraded underwater. Use remote Signal Beacons to blaze a path to Treasure

Music - Underwater World by indieteur

Update 1: Removed "Next Level" Option from Final Level

Update 2: Added exception handling when space is pressed when submarine has no more remote signals remaining
